articles.title: Ringo Starr cancels North American tour after catching Covid - BBC
articles.description: The Beatles drummer is "recovering at home" and hopes to resume shows soon, his spokesperson says.
articles.content:
Sir Ringo Starr has cancelled several upcoming shows on his North American tour after catching Covid-19.
The former Beatle, who is 82, had been playing a string of dates in the US and Canada with hi… [+1792 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Sacheen Littlefeather, who declined Oscar, dies: Academy - CTV News
articles.description: Native American actress and activist Sacheen Littlefeather, who declined the best actor award on behalf of Marlon Brando during an Oscars protest in 1973, has died aged 75, the motion picture Academy said on Monday.
articles.content:
LONDON - 
Sacheen Littlefeather, the actor and activist who declined Marlon Brando's 1973 Academy Award for "The Godfather" on his behalf in an indelible protest of Hollywood's portrayal of Native A… [+5890 chars]
